name: Exadel
overview:
Mobile Cloud Platform

Exadel is a global software application development company providing innovative technology solutions to its clients. Exadel offers products and services to the leading enterprises and software developers.

Exadel’s Tiggzi is a cloud-based development platform for creating finished, fully-functional mobile Web and native apps for any device. Tiggzi is the only platform/solution that enables distributed teams to work collaboratively in real-time to develop mobile applications from prototype to a production ready application.

Tiggzi Capabilities:

  • Visualization: User-friendly / drag-and-drop visual editor leverages a rich set of UI components and provides data binding between UI and data sources and web services

  • Collaboration: Real-time collaboration between distributed development teams and business users enables all stakeholders to be actively involved in every stage of development, from prototype to distribution

  • Integration: Visual data-binding between UI components and data sources, REST, web services, or Cloud content

  • Write Once - Deploy Anywhere: supports multiple target platforms and devices. Deploy on all of the major platforms (iOS, Android, webOS, Windows Phone, and Blackberry)

  • Cloud Ready: ready to integrate with REST or web services

  • Zero Download / Zero Installation: Quickly jump-start any project with an easy-to-use preconfigured development environment

About Exadel

Exadel is the leading provider of innovative software development to leading businesses across all vertical industries. Exadel’s technology leaders partner with clients to deliver high-quality products rapidly and cost-effectively. Our innovative team can provide unparalleled technology insights and trends that you will not find with other software partners. Exadel delivers fast, scalable, and cost-effective solutions that leverage a globally distributed development model using open source technologies to reduce application lifecycle costs and improve overall productivity to gain competitive advantage for its customers.
